original:

\syl ᐊᒑᐦᑯᐢ
\ps NA-1
\def star, little star
\dl Cree: pC
\dl Cree: wC
\gr1 singular; diminutive
\stm acâhkos-

\mrp atâhkw-
\mrp /-is/
\alt
\rel atâhk
\sem Sky
\gl star
\gl little
\cat

\gr2
\src AC

\src AN
\src FC
\src HW
\src LB
\src LL
\src ME
\src N-3
\src SR
\src W&A

\sro acâhkos êkâ kâ-âhcît
\syl ᐊᒑᐦᑯᐢ  ᐁᑳ  ᑳ ᐋᐦᒌᐟ
\ps INM < NA-1 + NEG + VAI-1
\def North Star, Polaris; [literally: "star that does not move"]
\dl Cree: pC
\gr1 singular; diminutive / Negative / Conjunct, 3s
\stm acâhkos-
\drv atâhkw- + /-is/
\mrp atâhkw-
\mrp /-is/
\stm êkâ
\stm âhcî-
\drv {kâ-} + âhcî- + {-t}
\mrp /âht-/
\mrp /-î/
\mrp {-t}
\alt
\rel
\sem
\gl North Star
\gl north
\gl star
\gl Polaris
\cat
\his
\gr2
\src AW
\new new
\dt 03/Oct/2020

\mrp /-is/
\stm osoyi-

\mrp /o-/
\mrp -soy-
\mrp /-i/-2
\alt
\rel atâhk kâ-osôsit
\sem Sky
\gl comet
\gl star
\gl tail
\cat
\his
\gr2
\new new
\src DM
\dt 13/Jul/2021

\sro acâhkosa kâ-otakohpit
\syl ᐊᒑᐦᑯᓴ  ᑳ ᐅᑕᑯᐦᐱᐟ
\ps INM < NA-1 + VAI-1
\def Starblanket; Cree chief, signatory to Treaty 4; [literally: "One who has Stars as a Blanket"]
\dl Cree: pC
\gr1 Name: obviative (4) / Conjunct, 3s(-4)
\stm acâhkos-
\drv atâhkw- + /-is/
\mrp atâhkw-
\mrp /-is/
\stm otakohpi-
\drv /ot-/ + akohp- + /-i/
\mrp /ot-/-2
\mrp akohp-
\mrp /-i/-2
\alt acâhkosa k-ôtakohpit
\rel
\sem Personal Names
\sem People
\gl star
\gl blanket
\gl starblanket
\gl chief
\gl Cree
\cat
\his
\gr2
\src AW
\dt 01/Jun/2021
literalMeaning: One who has Stars as a Blanket
